     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10473270">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10473270">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10473270">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10473270">
          <div id="boxatt10473270" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12730658">
              <a id="link_12730658" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/aboutSeries.do?inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;seriesId=0PHU" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730658,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730658}); ">
               Business Plans Handbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of sample business plans.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link13228948">
              <a id="link_13228948" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9781414486864&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13228948,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13228948}); ">
               Encyclopedia of American Industries
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides detailed, comprehensive information on a wide range of industries in every realm of American business. The work consists of more than 1,000 detailed profiles of the manufacturing and service industries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23404156">
              <a id="link_23404156" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9781558628540&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23404156,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22966620}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Global Brands
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains 270 entries, written in case-study style, that highlight interesting details including how a product originated and was first marketed, how it developed commercially and how it fares today compared with its competitors and its own past history. Included are anecdotes pertaining to the famous, or infamous, marketing strategies and advertising campaigns that managed to capture the sometimes jaded viewers' attention
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23404162">
              <a id="link_23404162" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5XFA" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23404162,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19720906}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Strategies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available online. This volume is a continuation of the Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Campaigns.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730770">
              <a id="link_12730770" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1VHW" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730770,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730770}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Management
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Well-written and documented entries, complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23404178">
              <a id="link_23404178" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/2NVW" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23404178,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23404178}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Small Business
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provide entrepreneurs with how-to information that they can apply to their own business. Features revised and expanded coverage to reflect the most current small business topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21719795">
              <a id="link_21719795" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/aboutSeries.do?inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;seriesId=0IAD" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21719795,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21719775}); ">
               International Directory of Company Histories
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A reliable source of historical information for many companies: American and foreign, private and public, past and present-day.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link14939899">
              <a id="link_14939899" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Doc?id=10619496" target="_blank" onclick="hit(14939899,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 14939899}); ">
               Nonprofit Almanac 2012
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contents: 1. The nonprofit sector and its place in the national economy -- 2. Wage and employment trends -- 3. Trends in private giving and volunteering -- 4. Financial trends -- 5. The size, scope, and finances of public charities
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2978973" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
